meanings.sent1: The talented lithographers carefully crafted each lithograph by hand.
meanings.sent2: The lithographers at the art studio are known for their detailed lithographs.
meanings.sent3: The lithographers decided to have a race to see who could create the best lithograph in under an hour.
meanings.sent4: The lithographers' workshop was a hive of creativity, each artist a master of their craft.
meanings.sent5: The lithographers used their skills to bring the images to life on paper.

meanings.definition: A company or business that specializes in lithography.
meanings.sent1: The local lithographers' shop offers high-quality lithography services.
meanings.sent2: Many famous artists collaborate with lithographers to create unique prints.
meanings.sent3: The lithographers' company picnic was filled with colorful lithograph prints hanging everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The lithographers' business was booming, with orders pouring in from all over the country.
meanings.sent5: The lithographers' studio was a hub of innovation, constantly pushing the boundaries of lithography.
